input_email_body:
Subject: Trouble with Hadoop Cluster After Apache Update

Unfortunately, our Hadoop cluster has experienced a crash, which may be related to a recent Apache update. Despite my attempts to restart the services, the issue remains unresolved, with the cluster currently offline and preventing data processing. I kindly request your assistance in addressing this issue promptly You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. Please inform me if you need further details from me. Thank you. My name is Maria Gonzalez.
